title: (x) ACA Pacific - ITC Fat Face {Passenger}
content:
Hi all,   
   
great site, been told to design this font..   
   
 [http://www.acabusinesssolution.com/welcome/welcome.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818102425/http:/www.acabusinesssolution.com/welcome/welcome.html)   
   
ACA Pacific to ACW Solutions, ok i managed to do the "W" by copying the letter "A" and tilt it upside down worked effective but the Solutions is a nightmare cos i am not sure what font it is, but i looked in to Bodini its pretty close but still not 100% sure on it.   
   
cheers   
 ![is it or not?](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818102425im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47598.jpg)
author: webbman75

comments.content: The top one is definitely ITC Fat Face, as passenger says. The bottom one appears an attempt to fake ITC Fat Face using Bauer Bodoni and doing some editing of the shapes.
wow thanks for the great help... ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818102425im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
